mapper.select: SELECT reservation_id, username, phone, email, date, time, created_at FROM reservations ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT reservation_id AS reservationId, branch, pet_name AS petName, pet_weight AS petWeight, applicant_name AS applicantName, applicant_phone AS applicantPhone, ob_date AS obDate, ob_time AS obTime, notes, user_id AS userId, created_at AS createdAt /* 필요한 경우 'status' 컬럼 추가 (테이블에 존재 시) */ FROM obreserve ORDER BY STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(ob_date, ' ', ob_time), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') DESC, created_at DESC
